title: Display nested document with n level
description:
Nested documents not displaying with n level(more than 2 level)

 

check here with detail

comments.content: The referenced StackOverflow question seems like a support question, and this community doesn't use JIRA for support questions. Please take the question to the solr-user mailing list and if a bug or feature request grows out of that a new issue can be filed with the appropriate details.
comments.author: Cassandra Targett
